document_data.name: Cressida Flint
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cressida Flint''' was an inhabitant of the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''Can't I pace and think in peace? The cheek of you.''|Cressida Flint}}
document_data.Description: Cressida was a [[human]] woman with a tan skin tone, straight and long dark brown hair, and dark brown eyes. She wore a colorful striped orange and red [[tunic]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Cressida Flint could often be found pacing down the streets of the Lower City, consumed by her thoughts. She reacted hostilely to anyone who dared to interfere with her busy day. She was one of the customers interested in the [[Honest Vendor]]'s not-so-magical protective trinkets.
